title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 May 2024, Farioli was appointed head coach of Dutch club Ajax, signing a three-year contract and becoming the club's first Italian manager.

title: Ajax appoint Francesco Farioli as new head coach - ESPN
snippet: Ajax confirmed the appointment of Francesco Farioli as their new head coach on a three-year contract on Thursday.

title: Francesco Farioli new Ajax head coach
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with Francesco Farioli and OGC Nice on the transfer of the head coach to Ajax. Farioli signed a three-year contract.

title: Ajax name Italian Farioli as coach | Reuters
snippet: Ajax Amsterdam have confirmed the appointment of Francesco Farioli as coach starting next month, the Dutch club said in a statement.

title: Rebuilding Ajax: How Francesco Farioli Has Transformed the Dutch Giants | Opta Analyst
snippet: Ajax, the record Dutch champions, finished fifth in the Eredivisie – their worst finish in the league since 1999-00. Even more damning was their points-per-game average of just 1.65, the club’s lowest in a single Eredivisie season since 1964-65 (based on three points per win). After such a disastrous campaign, they appointed Francesco Farioli to replace interim coach John van ‘t Schip.
